To invest in this ETF, you must grant Multitoken

wallet. This must only be done once.
beforeCreatingPre: Before creating this ETF, make sure the
cannotAddLiquidity: The ETF controller has not enabled adding liquidity to this ETF

Cap set to initial supply;
raise to enable public LPs
changeControllerWarning:
Ensure you have the private key.
Otherwise you will lose control of the ETF! If you want to control the ETF from the Multitoken interface you need to use a proxy account as controller, don't use your wallet directly as controller.
confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove the token
connectWalletToAddLiquidity: Please connect your wallet to continue
createProxy: Create a proxy contract to manage liquidity on Multitoken. This is a one-time action and will save you gas in the long run.

deadEtfWarning: The controller has removed all tokens from this ETF; you can no longer interact with it.
deadPoolWarning: The controller has removed all tokens from this pool; you can no longer interact with it.
disclaimer: By continuing you agree that Multitoken is not liable for any losses you may incur
enablePauseTrading: Enable or pause trading in your ETF
errExceedsBalance: Token amount should not exceed balance
errInconsistentTimelock: Minimum gradual weight change duration must be >= add token timelock
errInvalidDenorm: Weight percentages must be between {min} and {max}
errMaxEtfTokens: ETF should contain no more than 8 tokens
errMaxPoolTokens: Pool should contain no more than 8 tokens
errMinEtfTokens: ETF should contain at least 2 tokens
errMinPoolTokens: Pool should contain at least 2 tokens
errMinTokenBalance: Token balance in wei form needs to be at least 1,000,000. For example, WBTC has 8 decimals, so the minimum is 0.01 WBTC.
ethBuffer: Keep some ether to pay for gas.
highRiskEtf: This is a higher-risk ETF that contains one or more unlisted tokens. A liquidity ETF is only as good as its weakest token! If a token were blacklisted, infinitely minted, frozen, or exploited in any other way, the value of this ETF could go to 0. Multitoken is never liable for losses incurred through using our UI or the Multitoken protocol. Be careful, and do your own research!
highRiskPool: This is a higher-risk pool that contains one or more unlisted tokens. A liquidity pool is only as good as its weakest token! If a token were blacklisted, infinitely minted, frozen, or exploited in any other way, the value of this pool could go to 0. Multitoken is never liable for losses incurred through using our UI or the Multitoken protocol. Be careful, and do your own research!

liquidityFail: Adding liquidity might fail with max balance if a trade occurs before the transaction is mined. Use high gas price or

from {startTime} ({startBlock})

pokeWeightsEarly:
The ETF has an ongoing gradual weight update
(see About), but has not yet started.
pokeWeightsGeneral: The ETF does not currently have an ongoing gradual weight update. If it did, 'Poke' would set the weights to values along the update curve, corresponding to the current block.
pokeWeightsOngoing: The ETF has an ongoing gradual weight update (see About). 'Poke' will set the weights to values along the update curve, corresponding to the current block. This operation may change token prices, and might be gas-intensive.
